response:
"wie kann man noch heute glauben, dass die eingabe von persönlichen daten im internet sicher ist? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "how can one still believe that entering personal data online is safe? #dataprivacy #privacy"

this post critically questions the notion that personal information can be safely shared online, highlighting the importance of data privacy and the need for caution when sharing personal details on the internet. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and connect with others who are interested in this topic.
